issue.title: [Go][IPC]
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12138](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12138). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Update generated flatbuffer files for Golang apache arrow so that newer IPC features like compression can get implemented.
